channel.title: Comments on: Blog
channel.description: Civil Society Coalition Working to Open Budgets

item.title: By: Zukiswa Kota
item.dc:creator: Zukiswa Kota
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/#comment-139">Richardmig</a>.
Hi there, Richardmig - just a reminder to please also keep an eye out for updates on https://vulekamali.gov.za/events - and perhaps see you at one of the upcoming events if you're in South Africa!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Richardmig.

Hi there, Richardmig – just a reminder to please also keep an eye out for updates on
https://vulekamali.gov.za/events – and perhaps see you at one of the upcoming events if you’re in South Africa!

item.title: By: Richardmig
item.dc:creator: Richardmig
item.description:
It's a pity you don't have a donate button! I'd most certainly donate to this fantastic blog! I guess for now i'll settle for book-marking and adding your RSS feed to my Google account. I look forward to brand new updates and will talk about this blog with my Facebook group. Chat soon!
<a href="https://plus.google.com/100363205416005321114" rel="nofollow">harrisburg seo experts</a>
item.content:encoded:
It’s a pity you don’t have a donate button! I’d most certainly donate to this fantastic blog! I guess for now i’ll settle for book-marking and adding your RSS feed to my Google account. I look forward to brand new updates and will talk about this blog with my Facebook group. Chat soon!

harrisburg seo experts
